projects.name: Epub Reader
projects.description: An epub reader with authentication uses django at backend to authenticate,stores the books at aws-s3, uses reactjs at front-end

projects.name: Youtube playlist total time finder
projects.description: This website is used to find the total playlist length of a specific youtube playlist uses django at backed

projects.name: crowdcoin
projects.description: it is a clone for kickstarter but backend is ethereum blockchain for secure and trusted transactions and front-end is reactjs with a theme of semanatic-ui-react

projects.name: url shortner
